description:
Kodai Mamoru was the Captain of the Space Destroyer Yukikaze. He held the rank of Space Lieutenant Commander, 3rd class. He was from Kanagawa Prefecture.
He was an Officer in the UN Cosmo Navy. Susumu Kodai`s older brother. When he graduated from the Space Officer Academy, the war situation was worsening and talented people were being lost one after another. He was made the captain of a destroyer. He lost his parents in a planet bomb attack, and his only remaining blood relative is his younger brother.
name: Kodai Mamoru
